viewConfig.title: View Configuration
viewConfig.bookSourceTooltip: Only one can be selected, current options: 1, 2, 3, recommended default source is 3
viewConfig.downloadPathTooltip: Absolute or relative path (For Windows, use / or \ instead of \)
viewConfig.logLevelTooltip: Default is error (panic fatal error warn info debug trace)
viewConfig.crawlThreadsTooltip: -1 means automatic setting, setting too high may trigger anti-crawling mechanisms
viewConfig.maxRetriesTooltip: For chapters that fail on first download attempt

downloadNovel.downloadComplete: '{{bookName}}' download complete! Output path: {{outputPath}} Time taken: {{takeTime}} seconds
downloadNovel.downloadFailure: Failed to download '{{bookName}}', please try again later
downloadNovel.storageWarning: Unable to store search results, storage may be full
downloadNovel.searchFailure: Search failed, please try again later

usageInfo.title: fy-novel Usage Information
usageInfo.disclaimerContent: This program is the author's Go language learning practice project. Any issues arising from its use are not related to the author!!!
usageInfo.notesContent: Some sources do not support proxy access!!!
